description: The Training Activity Summary Page (formerly the Training Exit Survey Cover Page) dataset contains data about each training event. This dataset includes information about the type of training (specific training types), training sub-type (gatekeeper, clinical, or other), how many people attended the training, and the duration of the training.

distribution.title: Training Activity Summary Page (TASP) State and Tribe

publisher.name: Substance Abuse & Mental Health Services Administration

title: Training Activity Summary Page (TASP) State and Tribe
